question:
Read the text and answer the following questions !    One day I flew from Denpasar to Makasar. I went with Kevin and Kathrin. Kevin is the Project Manager for Cool Radio English and Kathrin is the Program Officer for AuSAID.

The pilot said something over the intercom in Bahasa Indonesia. I did not understand him. I asked someone sitting near me for a clue. I looked out the window and could see the tires on my side of the plane lowering. I felt a little weak in the knees. I realized I had been holding my breath for a quite a while

1. From where the writer flew?

2. Who is Kevin?

3. Who is Kathrin?

4. Did the writer understand with Bahasa Indonesia?

5. What is the writer feeling when he looked out the window?


bantuin kak nyelesain misi, harus bener, salah report​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2.kevin is theProject Manager fot cool radio english

3.kathrin is the program officer for AuSaid

.

Jawaban:

1. Denpasar

2. Kevin is the Project Manager for Cool Radio English

3. Kathrin is the Program Officer for AuSAID.

4. No, he did not.

5. He felt a little weak in the knees

Penjelasan:

Mga membantu

related_questions.question:
44. Change the verb into the correct form!    a. She (drive) very well.
b. They (open) the store at 8:00.
c. Linda (be) a very pretty girl.​

answers.answer:
a. she drivied very well

b. they opened the store at 8:00

c. Linda being a very pretty girl.

related_questions.question:
Text for questions number 21 - 23.    I am an SMP student. My name is Randi. I have
one sister and two brothers. My sister's name is Tasya
and my brothers' names are Bimo and Zaky. My father's
name is Bambang and my mother's name is Alya. I live
with my family at 7 Batu Sangkar Street.
I am twelve years old. Tasya is ten years old. Bimo
is six years old. Zaky is three years old. My father is
fourty three and my mother is fourty. We are good
family
21. Randi's sister is ..... years old.
b. 6
a. 3
c. 10
d. 12
Ut?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

21. Randy's sister is..... years old

c.10

related_questions.question:

Please don't forget to pick up our son at 12 o'clock at his school. And also on forget to take his fou
lunch, he would love to have some spaghetti and ice cream
With love, Plumary
a. Who is receive the short message?
b. Who is sending the short message?
c. What must Johnathan do?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A.Johnathan

B.Plumary

C.Pick up his son at 12 o'clock dan give his lunch to him

Jawaban:

a. Plumary's husband

b. Plumary is sending the short message

c. He must pick up their son at 12 o'clock at his school

Penjelasan:

Moga berguna
